data.name: RPG Sounds - Pirate Ship - Sound Pack
data.detailed_description:
Pirate Ship is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • Here Comes The Kraken
  • Sea Gets Rough
  • The Finest Rum In The Captain's Cellar

Ambient Sounds
  • Sea Calm
  • Sea Violent

SFX
  • Cannon Fire Hits Ship (4)
  • Cannon Fire Miss (4)
  • Sail Lift (1)
  • Ship Bell (3)
  • Ship Wood Creak (5)
  • Ranged Pistol Flesh (3)
  • Ranged Pistol Metal (3)
  • Ranged Pistol Miss (4)
  • Ranged Pistol Wood (3)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
